feed.title: Some current turbulence on the Bitcoin network: DB corruption errors on start from Bitcoin-qt / Bitcoind

entry.title: Some current turbulence on the Bitcoin network: DB corruption errors on start from Bitcoin-qt / Bitcoind
entry.summary: For users looking for a workaround on Windows, there is a helpful write-up available on the BitcoinTalk forum. The post includes step-by-step instructions on how to implement the workaround. It is important to note that the workaround is specific to the Windows operating system and may not work on other platforms. Additionally, it is recommended that users exercise caution when making changes to their system settings. Overall, the forum post provides a useful resource for those seeking to address this issue on Windows.
